programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks reside on Seaside Island in Hedgehog Village. Together, they defend the island from various threats like Doctor Eggman and his robotic creation.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 23
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 6
programme.desc: A grieving Lloyd is possessed by the ghost of Morro - the Master of Wind and Wu's first student. In Lloyd's body, Morro renders the other ninja powerless before stealing Wu's staff. This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime to solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and get stuck in his game forever!

programme.title: On The Red Dot - The Food That Made Me - EP 40
programme.desc: Renowned French pastry Chef Pang wants to go back to his roots and open a Hakka heritage food stall. What he discovers is a stunning history of a stoic people who were forced from their homes. Our food tells us incredible stories of how we lived, fought and survived. Join 5 personalities as they embark on a journey to discover their past through the traditional food that they loved.

programme.title: TKO: Total Knock Out S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Each episode features five contestants running an obstacle course. One contestant will run through a course featuring four zones, while the remaining contestants man "battle stations," firing projectiles to try to slow the racer down or knock them off the course.

programme.title: Little Big Shots US S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: This engaging series features kids whose accomplishments in music, dance, academics, and downright amazing tricks far exceed their years. Hosted by Steve Harvey, it also showcases kids who took the Internet by storm with viral videos and celebrates phenomenal children from all over the globe.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 646
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The ZhuZhus - EP 4
programme.desc: The ZhuZhuPets are no ordinary pets, they are EXTRAORDINARY and they can talk! Always on a quest for fun, they have to stay on their tiny toes to keep up with the non-stop action, laughs and adventures.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series Yr 1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Based on Walt Disney Animation Studios Oscar-winning feature film.

programme.title: Power Rangers Ninja Steel - EP 4
programme.desc: A new team of superhuman power rangers must work together and use their new ninja powers to prevent evil from dominating the human race and from destroying the planet earth and the universe.

programme.title: Transformers Robots In Disguise S4 - EP 17
programme.desc: An animated series set years after Transformers: Prime, it follows Bumblebee as he leads a ragtag group of Autobots back to Earth when Decepticons crash land on the planet.

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 42
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Totally Totto - EP 5
programme.desc: Isaac Ng has never been good in science, and gets bored in class easily. He wishes he could develop a passion for it, just like his scientist father. Little does he know he's about to get what he wished for - in the form of Totto, a genius bunny who takes him on many fun and crazy adventures in science! Totally Totto is a live action series with an adorable puppet and animation-filled segments that brings science to your fingertips.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 - EP 2
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 12

programme.desc: A diverse team of scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific, as dangerous as it is beautiful. Cut off from everything they know, the team ventures into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape a primal Eden in which humanity does not belong.

programme.title: News 5 - EP 38
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

Be surprised by unexpected stories. Marvel at iconic landscapes. And be awestruck by spectacular wildlife.

programme.title: Weird, True & Freaky - EP 3
programme.desc: Weird, True & Freaky reveals the worlds most unbelievable and scariest animal encounters ever. Prepare to witness natures most terrifying confrontations gone horribly wrong. From creatures of the deep entering our lives, to deformed animals fighting to overcome any obstacle, the extraordinary beings keep coming.

(PG)(重)森美昏睡不醒，子骏必须家庭事业两兼顾，发现照顾两个孩子锐心和锐康姐弟不是简单的任务，尤其是患有社交障碍症的锐康，此时才知森美的辛苦。子骏在医院和一个女人曼蓉擦肩而过，感觉她有点面善，殊不知曼蓉竟是森美的闺蜜……。.

programme.title: 一点新闻 News 8 at One - EP 25

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 117
programme.desc: (R) Boris gives Ke Ai a handmade necklace to congratulate her on being the female lead. The word "Love" is engraved in the necklace, and Ke Ai takes the necklace off in case Shun Shui misunderstands. However, Ke Ai misplaces the necklace and it was found by Shun Shui. At the spur of the moment, Ke Ai panicks and denies that that the necklace belongs to her. Deng Bo comes to the rescue and says that the necklace is a birthday gift for his daughter. (PG)(重)Boris祝贺可爱当上第一女主角，送她一串亲手做的项链。可爱因为项链刻有Love字，担心顺水误会，先解下才进店里。不料项链没收好，被顺水拣到，可爱情急之下否认是她掉的。邓波帮她解围，说那是自己要送给女儿的生日礼物。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Fort Canning is an iconic hilltop landmark that has undergone many of Singapore's milestones. Besides a archaeological dig with artefacts from the 14th century, you can also savour a bowl of traditional Bak Kut Teh! Come along on an exciting adventure at Fort Canning! (重)拥有700年历史的福康宁山，曾经是禁山、皇家山和军事基地！这里不仅有保存14世纪的文物，也有现代多媒体的展览！至今还能吃到“皇家山脚”的肉骨茶！一起和两位搜密组员探索我们你不知道的福康宁山！.

programme.title: 乐学每疫刻 Learn Together With Me S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Dennis discusses nutritional needs with a Nutritionist. Chef Lennard teaches another nutritional and simple recipe, and DJ Hazelle demonstrates more simple exercises to follow at home. 这一集的《乐学每疫刻》周崇庆将会和营养师探讨人们的营养需求。Chef Lennard 来教大家另一道简单又有营养的鱼粥。933 DJ颖双和健身教练也要示范更多居家运动。.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe LOVE 972 - EP 19

programme.desc: (R) Zi Jun's in laws, Xing Hua and Lan Ying, move in to his house to help take care of the household matters. Lan Ying is strict with the children, and enforces many rules on them. The family obeys her begrudgingly. Zi Jun finds out that Sen Mei had secretly kept an ornament with a fresh rose, and the message "Everlasting Love" is written on the card. He starts to suspect her. Man Rong joins Zi Jun's company and competes with him, threatening Zi Jun's career... (PG)(重)子骏的岳父母兴华和岚英入住子骏家，帮他打理一切。岚英管教孩子严厉，规矩繁多，令众人无奈。子骏发现森美藏有一枚如鲜花般的玫瑰精品，卡片上还写着“永不凋谢的爱”，不禁感疑惑。曼蓉加入子骏公司，与他竞争，子骏事业受威胁……。.

programme.title: 一起轻旅行 Travel Together - EP 4
programme.desc: This food programme brings us to all corners of Taiwan in search of delicious and authentic Taiwanese food. Places of recommendation include Yi Lan, Bei Tou, Tai Nan, Kaohsiung etc. “一起轻旅行” 将带观众到台湾的各个角落，寻找正宗古早味的美食。.

programme.title: The Wish - EP 4
programme.desc: 27-year old Joseph Lee has brain cancer that may have impaired his sight and balance - but he does not let his fragile condition stop him from his mission. He wants to fulfill a childhood dream for the woman who brought him up - his late grandmother. With the help of the Dreammakers team, The Wish team helps Joseph to overcome physical obstacles and experiences an adventure beyond his expectations. 二十七岁的李杰桐患有脑癌，这可能损害了他的视力和平衡能力，但他并没有让自己的脆弱状况阻止他执行任务。 他想为抚养他的女人，已故的祖母实现童年的梦想。 在”"聚爱圆梦”" 团队的帮助下，杰桐克服了身体上的障碍并经历了超出他预期的冒险。.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 22
programme.desc: Dong Yu looks for Mandy's father, Ming Fa, to talk to him but sees a reporter passing him money donated by the readers instead. Dong Yu follows Ming Fa and sees that he immediately goes to the gambling den once he got the money. Dong Yu threatens Ming Fa with a video of him at the gambling den, Ming Fa then clarifies online that his daughter is not unfilial, Mandy feels grateful towards Dong Yu. (PG)东宇去找Mandy的父亲明发，想和他谈谈，却见到记者正将读者捐的钱交给他。明发钱一到手，即刻到地下赌场开赌，被跟踪而来的东宇发现。东宇以明发在赌场大杀四方的视频，威胁他为Mandy平反。明发在网上澄清女儿不是不孝女，Mandy感激东宇。.

programme.title: 健康密码 第三季 Health Code S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Hosted by doctor-writer Ouyang Lin and Boey Leung, this third series will further discuss more on health care tips and sickness with specialists & nutritionists on common diseases. 健康密码第三季，医生作家欧阳林和知性新闻主播梁宝仪继续率领国内各专科医生为大家隔空看诊，这次还会穿插外景环节，带领观众走进手术室、疫苗存库、国家血库中心、药剂行等，为大家带入最前线的医学资讯，分享最新的医疗科技！.

programme.title: 最佳利益 Best Interest - EP 1
programme.desc: Bo Yun finally gets an interview with Chang He Firm. On the way, he helped to catch a robber, which caused Bo Yun to be late for the interview. Habitually, Bo Yun likes to listen in on court cases. On this occasion, he lent a hand to Fang Zheng to solve her case . (PG)(首播)博昀好不容易得到「长河律师事务所」的面试机会。在前往面试的中途帮忙抓抢劫犯，而耽误了面试时间。 茫茫然的他习惯性跑法院旁听，意外地帮了方筝一把 ！.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Li Quan asks Zhao Zilong to take the two legendary swords to Situ Wangyun. Worried about Zilong's safety during his journey to Luo Yang, Xiahou Qingyi decides to follow him. (PG)(重)李全吩咐赵子龙，把那两把宝剑送交司徒王允。夏侯轻衣担忧子龙在路上出事，决定一路跟随他到洛阳。.

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. (重)4月份最新公布的2019台北米其林指南推荐美食，在型男主厨吴秉承带路下，挖掘米其林美食背后的秘辛。包括必比登推荐街头小吃古早味米糕，经典江浙菜黄豆炖猪脚，老牌烟燻鹅肉，以及藏身在华西街夜市，首次入选米其林一星的台南担仔面。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Rui Xin is unhappy with Lan Ying and Zi Jun, so she leaves home to stay with Man Rong. Zi Jun's good friend Li Qun persuades Zi Jun to give in, and Zi Jun relents. At work, Man Rong oppresses Zi Jun, and her marketing proposal is well-liked by their boss. Zi Jun feels defeated. (PG)(重)锐心对岚英和子骏不满，离家出走，入住曼蓉家。子骏怒责曼蓉教唆锐心离家出走，要锐心马上跟他回去，锐心拒绝，双方僵持不下。好友立群劝子骏让步，子骏只好妥协。工作上，曼蓉趁机打压子骏，提出的宣传方案被老板娘接受，子骏感受挫。.

(重)婚前完全不会下厨，结果婚后遭婆家嫌弃！陈元蓉因此发奋学煮，练就一身好手艺，还当起了小贩，一做就做了30多年。65岁的她，已到了退休年龄，却为了要照顾弱智的养女，不得不继续忙碌赚钱，目前在荷兰通道的熟悉中心卖客家酿豆腐，每天凌晨1点就要开始备菜。客家酿豆腐的步骤看似简单，但制作馅料和酿入馅料的过程，仍十分讲究技巧。主持人钟琴和男嘉宾黄振隆是否能顺利完成这道菜呢？.

Casts: Zhu Mimi, Marcus Chin, Chew Chor Meng, Quan Yifeng, Pan Lingling. 退休了的杨老妈跟老三光荣和中国媳妇温柔，以及小儿子德华一起住，婆媳共处，本来就存有不少问题。大儿子大富也带了妻子美凤和女儿搬回来住。从此大富就夹在老妈、老婆中间，加上妹妹的兴风作浪，还有弟媳的"民族情意结",处于水深火热的他该如何是好？三个女人一个墟，何况家里有5个女人。他会不会成为"墟"里的"牺牲品"呢？....演员：朱咪咪, 陈建彬, 周初明, 权怡凤, 潘玲玲.

Song Haoran's subordinate realized Sidong had recovered his memories and decided to punish him according to the rules. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)方行接受假死安排，却不愿消除记忆，所以在假死前，布下迷阵和置入记忆，让思冬找到买凶杀自己的真凶。记起一切的思冬，如今一个身体，彷佛变成两个人，拥有双重性格，双重记忆。宋皓然的手下发现思冬恢复记忆，要「按规矩」处置思冬／方行。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Death is inevitable, but dying painfully can and should be avoided. In Mongolia, where cancer mortality rates are one of the world's highest, Danny Yeo meets palliative care doctors whom are fighting against system and social barriers, to help patients find meaning and comfort in "a good death". (重)蒙古医疗资源紧张，可是临终护理一枝独秀。这跟蒙古有众多肝癌末期病人有关，更是“临终护理之母”敖登托雅教授努力的成果。杨君伟发现，临终部门的强力止痛针，对垂死病人尤其珍贵。临终护理，如何实现蒙古人的善终？.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 44
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Chengzhu finds a DNA report and Xinxing's photographs in Daoxi's room. She questions Na-yan about her real identity. Seeing that the truth is coming to light soon, Na-yan admits that she has been posing as Daoxi and that Daoxi has already passed away. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)成珠在道希的房间里找到道希和娜妍的基因鉴定报告及新星的照片，于是质问娜妍她到底是谁。娜妍见纸包不住火，终于向成珠承认她是娜妍，而道希早已在过世。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 9

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 73

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 74

programme.desc: (R) Michelle Chia travels to Eswatini in Africa to visit Singaporean Tan Kah Ching who has worked as a volunteer in an orphanage since 2011. programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) From local egg tarts, braised delicacies to mala hotpot, which dish will leave a lasting impression? (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 食在有价值 For Food's Sake! - EP 2
programme.desc: Prices of bananas are on the rise, but who are really benefitting? Lennard travels to find out how food fads, farm fires, and deadly diseases are costing us our daily serving of fruit. 主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 15
programme.desc: In Tokyo, making a living is an uphill battle from young to old. An elderly barber runs a failing business with his wife, by curbing expenses to meagre $12 a day. A freelance street performer decided to pursue an alternative career after graduation but now with marriage on the cards, he worries about his future. And for a young single mother, her divorce left her stigmatised and when she finally found a job, her income is still insufficient to support her child's education cost. 曾经日赚1000新元的理发师，为什么沦为‘下流老人'，一日花费仅限12新元？拒绝成为主流白领，41岁街头表演艺人结婚成问题。30岁养老院护理员服务于日本最具潜力的行业，却存不了孩子未来的教育费。看高龄少子化问题如何冲击日本社会。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 6
programme.desc: This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, etc. In this episode, the host will bring viewers to tour Kyrgyz. 这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，享受终极的体验，参观名胜古迹。 覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。在这一集，主持人将带观众游览吉尔吉斯。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 61
programme.desc: Ep 61: Teacher Kim is amazed by the wine that Wu Chun has brewed and recommends Juxi to introduce the wine to the public. The jealous Yalan adds additives to the wine, causing Pung Gil Dang to be caught in a controversy. Ep 61: 金老师尝了吴春酿制的白首环童酒，觉得味道出奇地好，建议菊熙发表该酒。雅兰眼红，故意对酒钢里的酒动手脚。专家们在发表会上一喝就发现酒加入了添加剂。丰吉堂颜面扫地。金老师知道是雅兰搞鬼，想告诉菊熙真相，却被雅兰阻止。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 62
programme.desc: Ep 62: Yalan attempts to bribe Teacher Kim to keep quiet about the additives incident, but indirectly causes Teacher Kim to fall into a lake instead. Desperate to keep the matter under wraps, Yalan does not call for help. Ep 62: 雅兰想用钱收买金老师，在拉扯中，金老师不慎落水。雅兰为了自保，没有拨电寻求帮助。雅兰担心自己在复原酒内加入添加剂的事被拆穿，于是故意把添加剂安置在工作室里，利用金老师帮她顶罪。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 7
programme.desc: Yinsheng feels jealous when he sees Lewen and Li Ying having fun releasing hot air lanterns together. Lewen finds out that Li Ying made a wish for her to reunite with her mother. She asks Li Ying how he knows she has been separated from her mother. Li Ying says Lewen reminds him of the mysterious lady dancer which causes Lewen to panic... 胤圣看到乐温与李旲在街上一起开心地放风灯，有点吃醋。乐温看到李旲的风灯上写的是希望洪乐温找到自己的母亲。连忙问李旲怎么知道自己与妈妈分开的事。李旲亦通过风灯，跟乐温说她让他再次想起那神秘的舞女。让乐温十分恐慌。。。。。。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 8
programme.desc: Jinxian asks Zhao Wanheng out for fishing and proposes marriage for their children. When Xiayan visits the princess, she finds out that the crown prince will go to the garden so she staged a chance encounter with the crown prince. The two have an enjoyable conversation. Lewen feels a sense of loss when she sees this... 金宪约赵万衡钓鱼并向他提出了结为亲家的请求。霞妍去探访公主时，得知世子会去花园后，便假装在花园与世子偶遇，两人相谈甚欢；正巧被乐温撞见了这一幕，内心顿时感到有些许失落。。。。。。。.

programme.title: 声入人心 Super Vocal - EP 3
programme.desc: "Super Vocal" is a singing competition focused on classically trained singers, singing both operatic and musical pieces. It features 36 male singers, with six winners after a total of 100 days. The panel of judges include renowned opera singer Liao Chang Yong, Shang Wen Jie and Henry Lau. 节目由舞台公演和真人秀两部分组成，由3位出品人在100天内对36位演唱成员进行分组打磨、陪伴成长，最终选出6位首席演唱者获得美声音乐会全国巡演和发行音乐专辑的机会。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 35
programme.desc: Phaulkon takes advantage of King Narai's trust in him. He abuses his power and mistreats the commoners. Phetracha attempts to warn King Narai about Phaulkon, but to no avail. 深得那莱王宠信的华尔康仗着势力大而欺压百姓，惹得多位官员日渐不满。帕碧罗阇向那莱王谏言，那莱王却维护华尔康。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 36
programme.desc: Phaulkon plots a coup by collaborating with the French General Desfarges to send troops to Lawo. Ketsurang sneaks into Phaulkon's house to find out more. 华尔康意图谋反，串通法兰西的德法将军调派军队去罗涡城。佳苏兰偷偷潜入华尔康府中打探消息。.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 38
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: Tom Tom Bak 2019 - EP 1
programme.desc: Tom Tom Bak was one of the most entertaining kids variety show in the past years on Astro Ceria. It will return this year with Datuk Aznin Hj Nawawi or better known as Pak Nil as the host. The shwo will cast children between 2 years to 16 years old showing their talents and skills.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: In this episode, Chef Bob will share a unique recipe that uses instant or ramen noodles. Also, Khairudin Samsudin and Suhaimi Yusof discuss on the benefits of using hand sanitizers. Join Wan Shamsury as he show us simple exercises that can be done at home with your family.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 5
programme.desc: Nawal starts to develop feelings for Hanan. She is unable to accept the truth when Hanan tells her the real reason why he had married her. Hani's father searches a partner for her and warns her not to marry Hanan again.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 2
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. His tuition lessons with Raisya comes to end when he has to leave for University.But life for Azraf gradually takes a turn when he begins to miss her. He feels that he has fallen for her without him realizing it.

programme.title: Kasih Tiana - EP 1
programme.desc: Kasih Tiana, is about a mother who after being blessed with a miracle finds herself having to make a heart-breaking choice - to choose between her own life and that of her baby's. Will Tiana be willing to fulfill the powerful sense of duty as a mother and sacrifice her life to save her child?

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 17
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. Happiness turns into anxiety when Dhia finds out that she is pregnant.Worried about Emillia's condition, Zikri and Dhia had to lie to her the truth about the pregnancy.Meanwhile Shah constantly tries to get close to Dhia though he knew that she is Zikri wife.

programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 6
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. KARMA is a twisted, ironic story, about an old-fashioned, bitter spinster who 'trades' her unappealing character after she fell for a younger, rugged, happy-go-lucky bachelor. Karmaliah, in her late 30s; rose successfully in her career in sales through office politics and unscrupulous means. Her detestable character and bad fashion sense added to her inability to catch the attention of any potential suitor. Nobody dares to confront Karmaliah about her repulsive character until Johari, a new colleague, tells her off. Gradually she falls in love with Johari and starts to change her ways. But her past catches up on her. Johari meets an accident and receives an organ transplant from an ex-colleague whom Karmaliah used to betray. Johari loses his memory and ditches Karmaliah.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 4
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Hazri was heartbroken when he found out that his long-time girlfriend Farhana is already engage. Farhana had no choice but to abide to her mother's wishes .Though disappointed, Hazri vows to prove Farhana that she had made the wrong choice in her life.

programme.title: Kerana Kasih
programme.desc: What would life be if your mother is psychologically incapacitated? What would you do if you learnt why she is so different from other mothers is because she has autism, a lifelong development disability? Does having disability change the effect on how much a mother loves her child? Does being a normal person make you a competent mother than those with disabilities?Kerana Kasih is the second story of #KasihTrilogy the trilogy telemovies of a mothers love (kasih). It is a story about how an autistic mother who has to go through the legal and emotional struggles to retain the custody of her daughter just because of a --- selfish motive.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Finland - EP 4
programme.desc: Turku is located on the southwest coast of Finland and was the first capital of Finland from 1802 to 1812. Till to date, the city still holds its charm and is an important business and cultural center in Northern Europe. The 80s and the 90s of the last century saw a surge in the Muslim Diaspora population in the ancient city.We will share Ramadan experience at Turku City Centre Mosque with the multi-racial communities from the middle east and Africa on how they blend in with the Finnish cult Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

programme.title: The Sarah-Jane Mee Show
programme.desc: Join Sarah-Jane Mee for the afternoon's breaking news, along with interviews and lively debate on the big stories and issues of the day.

programme.desc: Join Mark Austin for a comprehensive take on the big stories of the day with reports and analysis from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Sky News at Six
programme.desc: Join Mark Austin for a comprehensive take on the big stories of the day with reports and analysis from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Sky News Tonight
programme.desc: Dermot Murnaghan brings perpective to the day's national and international news, with in-depth reporting, big interviews, analysis from our special correspondents, and lively debate.

programme.title: Sky News at Nine
programme.desc: All the day's news from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Sky News at Ten
programme.desc: Mark Longhurst brings you the latest home and international news, top sporting headlines and weather summaries.

programme.title: San Francisco: Future music
programme.desc: In San Francisco, EDM blends technology and art for artists like DJ Chuckie, Hardkiss and The M Machine. DJ Tommie Sunshine explores the symbiosis between EDM and technology in San Francisco, with artists such as DJ Chuckie, Hardkiss and The M Machine seamlessly weaving tech into their work.

programme.title: Time Waits for No One
programme.desc: As the UCI DH MTB World Cup season approaches, the time for talk is over. Riding fast is all that matters now. With the UCI DH MTB World Cup season fast approaching, the top riders in both the men’s and women’s divisions get ready to prove that their off seasons were well spent. The time for talk is over. Riding fast is all that matters now.

programme.title: Plot Twist
programme.desc: In downhill mountain bike racing, the only certainty is that nothing is certain until the last rider's run. With the 2017 season kicking off in Lourdes, France, expectations are running high. But in DH mountain biking, the only certainty is that anything can happen. For Loïc Bruni and the rest of the sport's elite, this means taking nothing for granted.

programme.title: Nervous Laughter
programme.sub-title: Surfing one of the world's biggest waves
programme.desc: See the story of how a group of friends from Maui's North Shore shattered the ceiling of big wave surfing. In the 1990s, a group of friends known as the Strapped Crew explored how to ride one of the world’s most fearsome waves, Jaws on Maui's North Shore. We chronicle how these pioneers shattered the ceiling of what big wave surfers thought was possible.

programme.title: Travailen
programme.desc: Trailblazers Ryan Sandes and Ryno Griesel embarked on the ultimate Drakensberg adventure. At midnight on Monday, March 24, 2014, trailblazers Ryan Sandes and Ryno Griesel embarked on the ultimate Drakensberg adventure – the Drakensberg Grand Traverse – in an attempt to break the current record of 60h 29m.

programme.title: Backcountry Powder Lines
programme.desc: New Zealand snowboarders Jake Koia and Roland Morely-Brown take a dream trip to Haines, Alaska to snowboard. New Zealand's backcountry megastar Jake Koia is joined by Roland Morely-Brown on a journey to Haines, Alaska in search of perfect backcountry to ride. Luck is on their side, as they find perfect riding conditions on their first day out.

programme.title: Heli Runs and Shooting Guns
programme.desc: Jake and Roland are blessed with a perfect day for snowboarding... and shooting guns with locals. Snowboarders Jake Koia and Roland Morley-Brown gear up for another epic bluebird day in Alaska's backcountry. After shredding some huge, picturesque lines, they decide the best way to follow that up is to shoot some high-powered guns with the locals.

programme.title: McCaul Meets Szymon Godziek
programme.desc: Cam McCaul meets up with Szymon Godziek at home in Poland and gets to ride at Szymon’s MTB practice yard. Cam McCaul travels to Poland to meet up with Szymon Godziek and his family at home. Cam gets a guided tour around Szymon’s specially-designed, obstacle-laden MTB practice yard, and Szymon shares some thoughts about his sport and home life.

programme.title: Trust
programme.desc: Get to know the people who surround Formula One driver and GP2 champion Pierre Gasly. Get to know the people who surround Formula One driver Pierre Gasly, icluding his engineer and coach who help him through every race. Respect and trust are key in these relationships in order for them to be able to push Gasly to be the fastest.

programme.title: Energy
programme.desc: Get a glimpse at the training routine Pierre Gasly's coach, Pyry, has him keeping. Formula One is a sport that requires well-rounded physical fitness from its pilots. Get a glimpse at the training routine Pierre Gasly's coach, Pyry, has him keeping to focus on retaining his energy.

programme.title: Suit
programme.desc: Take a look at the details that go into Pierre Gasly's Formula One suit. Take a look at the details that go into Pierre Gasly's Formula One suit. With weight being crucial the materials allow for the lightest weight possible while still being flame and heat resistant.

programme.title: The inspiration
programme.desc: Travis Rice and the Fourth Phase crew talk about the poetic spark that set the whole epic project in motion. Travis Rice and the Brain Farm crew talk about the 20-year-old poem that set off their journey to make The Fourth Phase. Their goals are clear, but accomplishing them will test everyone involved.

programme.title: The challenge
programme.desc: The film-makers discuss the immense pressure to raise the bar on snowboard films while telling a good story. The film-makers talk about the huge pressure they face to once again raise the bar of snowboard films. It's an undertaking that will take cutting edge technology, planning and guts.

programme.title: Ride: All In Red Bull Edition
programme.sub-title: The best dirt bike riders push to new heights
programme.desc: The best dirt bike riders from supercross, motocross, desert, FMX and endurocross push themselves to the top. Watch some of the best dirt bike riders, including Jeffrey Herlings, Jorge Prado, Marvin Musquin and Cody Webb, push themselves to be fitter, stronger and faster in pursuit of the top step of the podium.

programme.title: 28 Winters
programme.desc: Every rider has their own style, but snowboarding is always about freedom, friends and fun. Thomas Delago, Marcus Kleveland, Eero Ettala and the Nitro Snowboard team came to snowboarding by different paths, but they’ve all arrived at the same place: snowboarding is an escape from reality that’s all about freedom, friends and fun.

programme.title: Nicole Moudaber
programme.desc: Meet Nicole Moudaber, the DJ with a double life. Meet Nicole Moudaber, the DJ with a double life. When this Nigeria-born, London-based DJ and producer isn’t travelling the world performing at the world’s greatest clubs and festivals, Nicole likes to spend her spare time driving racing cars.

programme.title: Menno Van Gorp
programme.desc: When B-Boy Menno Van Gorp isn’t travelling the world proving his skills he spends his time creating art. When B-Boy and tracksuit entrepreneur Menno Van Gorp isn’t travelling the world proving his award-winning brand of fluid and innovative breakdancing skills, he spends much of his time creating artwork in his design studio in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

programme.title: Athens, Greece
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe travels to Athens to check out famous sandals, archaeology, water skiing and more. Hubertus von Hohenlohe continues his tour of exciting locations around the globe. This time he travels to Athens, Greece, to check out famous sandals, archaeology, water skiing and more.

programme.title: DJ Ready D
programme.desc: Cape Town musical icon DJ Ready D launches a grassroots organisation to inspire youth through hip-hop. Cape Town musical icon DJ Ready D, a Red Bull Amaphiko Academy mentor, is the founder of the Great Cape Ambassadors Program (G-CAP), a grassroots organisation that uses hip-hop to inspire at-risk youth in his childhood neighbourhood, Mitchells Plain.

programme.title: Lindsey Vonn: The Climb
programme.desc: An inside look at Lindsey Vonn's two-year journey to return from injury to world-class competitive skiing. After two devastating injuries, Lindsey Vonn is faced with the biggest challenge of her life. Can she recover and reclaim her place at the top of the competitive ski world? This film chronicles her journey and personal story of overcoming adversity.
